Site Won't Build

A customer writes in saying their “site won’t build”. Compose your best short (2-paragraph) customer-facing answer without any additional data, that could be useful
in the generic case but would also lead to a customer providing a more actionable response.

I'm sorry to here about your issue building your site and I understand that it is frustrating. Lets find out the root cause of your problem and our team will help you get up and running as soon as possible.
Most build issues can be resolved by using these support docs. We try to provide our customers with as many support options as possible in order to make the process as smooth as possible.
This is another resource that you can use for information on how Netlify builds sites . If these documents don't provide you with the information you need then we will be
happy to help you resolve your issue one on one.

In order to provide you with the help that you need we would like you to provide us with as much information as possible about your issue. When was the last time you attempted a build? I just
want to make sure there weren't any environmental issues occurring during your attempt. What build tools and what versions are you using for your site? Have you had the chance to look through
any of the logs; if so, did you find any errors? Is there any additional relevant information that you can provide us to help resolve your issue?
